game.shortDescription: 다른 일을 하고 있을 동안 화면 하단에서 실행되어 편안하게 즐길 수 있는 방치형 농장 시뮬레이터입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A relaxing idle-farming simulator that sits at the bottom of your screen while you do other things.

reviewHighlights.text: I left rusty for two hours came back and he’d grown crops, earned money and upgraded the farm. i left myself alone for 2 hours and did nothing but goo...
Fun little Idle game. Neat how it only covers 1/4-ish of the screen. Thank you for supporting jingle jam 2025!
